alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 31 at 9:38AM CDT until April 02 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Black River near Annapolis. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black River near Annapolis. * WHEN...Until Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding begins along County Road 146 Champion Springs Road... the road leading to the gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 AM CDT Thursday was 13.2 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 5.7 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Black River Annapolis 8.0 13.1 Thu 9 am 8.2 7.0 6.4 6.0 5.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
